author: usarica
body:
Backport of #23301

Collected improvements from @usarica over the last year:

- Resurrecting some old code (`getByLabel` --> `getByToken`, etc.) in RecoTracker/TrackProducer to fit track with vertex constraints
- Add the option to use these constraints in HipPy alignment
- More monitoring variables saved by HipPy
- interface stuff, like proxy forwarding

(Note the branch name is pretty old, but we've been `merge-topic`ing this for a while and using it for alignment without any problems.)
title: HipPy alignment algorithm improvements
